challenges.title: Build a Pre Designed Page (osmo)
description: Build this pre designed page.
The page must match pixel for pixel as close as possible.
Technology Stack: 1. Use HTML, CSS, Bootstrap 4, and Font Awesome to complete this project.
Click to view full size image.
For all the assets need to build this site click here.
The font used is sans-serif.
Buttons should be done with css NOT images.
Remember to use the Research-Ask method if you get stuck.

challenges.title: Build a Pre Designed Page (css tricks footer)
description: Build this pre designed page.
The page must match pixel for pixel as close as possible.
Technology Stack: 1. Use HTML, CSS and Bootstrap 4 to complete this project.
click to view full size image.
This site uses only 1 asset that is an sprite map. click here.
The font used is Whitney SSm A, Whitney SSm B which can be used by linking to this css here.
The font for the links at the bottom of the page are Whitney Cond A, Whitney Cond B.
Form use and hover colors and styles can be seen in this image here.
All the links at the bottom of the page, Contact through Guest Posting, must change their hover color like the About and Archives example.
Remember to use the Research-Ask method if you get stuck.

challenges.title: Update a Pre Existing Page (clean footer update)
description: Update a previously developed page. (See the facilitator to get your assigned page.)
The page must match pixel for pixel as close as possible.
Technology Stack: 1. Use only HTML and CSS to complete this project, do NOT use any libraries.
Click to view full size image.
Remember to use the Research-Ask method if you get stuck.
